articleContent.paragraphContent:
### [Smashing magazine](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/)

One of my first "go-to" portals, when I want to learn something solid. They have great authors and great content. Also check their [Vimeo channel](https://vimeo.com/smashingmagazine/videos) and [Smashing Conference's Channel](https://vimeo.com/channels/smashingconf/videos)
